dmca.title: [ABUSE] DMCA Notice Unauthorized Use of Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc. Property N
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, April 21, 2005 9:41 PM
To: Copyright Compliance
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Notice Unauthorized Use of Columbia Pictures
Industries, Inc. Property Notice ID: 8-183850]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

- -------- Original Message --------
From: - Thu Apr 21 21:36:23 2005
X-Mozilla-Status: 0001
X-Mozilla-Status2: 00000000
Received: from [172.16.214.180] (helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com)        by
mail
with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)        (Exim 4.50)        id
1DOjbz-0005vS-2G        for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Thu, 21 Apr 2005
16:53:27 -0500
Received: from spooling.theplanet.com ([69.56.141.4]
helo=lili.theplanet.com)        by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com)        with smtp (Exim)        id
1DOjbr-000CyX-Kd
for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Thu, 21 Apr 2005 16:53:26 -0500
Received: (qmail 28377 invoked from network); 21 Apr 2005 21:37:06 -0000
Received: from unknown (HELO ?216.185.111.52?) (172.16.214.110)  by
lili.theplanet.com with SMTP; 21 Apr 2005 21:37:06 -0000
Received: from [172.16.214.181] (helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com)        by
mail
with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim 4.50)        id
1DOize-0001OF-6z        for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 21 Apr 2005 16:13:50
-0500
Received: from [216.133.204.227] (helo=mail.baytsp.com)        by
mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
sony-pictures-no-reply@copyright-compliance.com)        with esmtps
(TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1DOizX-000Fk4-VY        for
abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 21 Apr 2005 16:13:49 -0500
Received: from 216.133.221.99 [216.133.221.99] by mail.baytsp.com        with
XWall v3.28 ; Thu, 21 Apr 2005 14:16:20 -0700
From: sony-pictures-no-reply@copyright-compliance.com
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Date: Thu, 21 Apr 2005 14:13:33 -0700
Received-SPF: pass (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of
copyright-compliance.com designates 216.133.204.227 as        permitted
sender) client-ip=216.133.204.227;
envelope-from=sony-pictures-no-reply@copyright-compliance.com;
helo=mail.baytsp.com;
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -97.0
Cc:
Subject: [ABUSE] DMCA Notice Unauthorized Use of Columbia Pictures
Industries, Inc. Property  Notice ID: 8-183850
X-BeenThere: abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version: 2.1.5
Precedence: list
Reply-To: sony-pictures-no-reply@copyright-compliance.com
List-Id: abuse.lists.theplanet.com
List-Unsubscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post: <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help: <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -97.0

Re:  Unauthorized Use of Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc. Property Notice
ID: 8-183850 Notice  Date: 21 Apr 2005 21:06:12 GMT


Dear Sir or Madam:

"Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc.", and its affiliated companies are the
exclusive owners of copyrights in motion pictures and television, including
the property listed below.

It has come to our attention that ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
is the service provider for the IP address listed below, from which
unauthorized copying and distribution (downloading, uploading, file serving,
file "swapping" or other similar activities) of Columbia Pictures Industies,
Inc.'s (property)(s) listed below is taking place.
We believe that the Internet access of the user engaging in this
infringement is provided by ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. or a
downstream service provider who purchases this connectivity from
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc..

This unauthorized copying and distribution constitutes copyright
infringement under Section 106 of the U.S. Copyright Act .  Depending upon
the type of service ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. is providing to
this IP address, it may have legal and/or equitable liability if it does not
expeditiously remove or disable access to the
(property)(s) listed below, or if it fails to implement a policy that
provides for termination of subscribers who are repeat infringers (see,
17 U.S.C.
dmca.principal_name: BayTSP, Inc. (for Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc.)
